headline: Defense CEOs Get Paid a Lot. Trump Is Pushing Them to Deliver.
summary: The president ordered future contracts to ensure base salaries for defense company CEOs are capped at current levels if contractors fail to perform.

headline: Trump’s Defense Budget Push And Payout Ban Could Be A Game Changer For RTX (RTX)
summary: In recent days, President Donald Trump signed an executive order banning dividends and share buybacks at underperforming U.S. defense contractors, while simultaneously calling for the 2027 military budget to rise to about US$1.50 trillion, with RTX repeatedly singled out over capital allocation and production speed. At the same time, RTX’s Collins Aerospace unit secured a US$438 million FAA radar modernization contract, underscoring how policy pressure on shareholder returns is coinciding...

raw.headline: Trump’s Defense Budget Push And Payout Ban Could Be A Game Changer For RTX (RTX)

At the same time, RTX’s Collins Aerospace unit secured a US$438 million FAA radar modernization contract, underscoring how policy pressure on shareholder returns is coinciding...

headline: 1 S&P 500 Stock to Own for Decades and 2 We Ignore
summary: The S&P 500 (^GSPC) is home to the biggest and most well-known companies in the market, making it a go-to index for investors seeking stability. But not all large-cap stocks are created equal - some are struggling with slowing growth, declining margins, or increased competition.
